text: At the wizard's command, the ground opens up to reveal a portal through which long-dead knights ride forth to do battle.
At the wizard's command, the ground opens up to reveal a portal through which long-dead knights ride forth to do battle.
Grasping hold of his foe, the wizard pours forth the decaying power of ages, desiccating flesh, armour and bone, and reducing his victom to dust in a single heartbeat.
The greatest practitioners of the dark arts can summon forth the most fearsome champions and creatures of undeath.
The greatest practitioners of the dark arts can summon forth the most fearsome champions and creatures of undeath.
The wizard tears the souls from his victims' bodies before breathing unlife into their sundered corpses.
The wizard draws tendrills of the Wind of Death into a dark fog that restores the undead and fills them with unholy vigour.
The wizard draws tendrills of the Wind of Death into a dark fog that restores the undead and fills them with unholy vigour.
Dwaring forth the dark energy coursing across the land, the caster send the tendrills of power seeping into the ground in search of long-dead bodies to answer his summons.

The wizard binds the bones of predatory creatures with dark magic, causing them to rise from their animal graves.
The wizard binds the bones of predatory creatures with dark magic, causing them to rise from their animal graves.

According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a cat should be able to fly. It does not have wings to get its fat little body off the ground. The cat, of course, flies anyways. Because cats don't care what humans think is impossible.
Nagash's pressence in the Mortal Realm acts as a conduit, allowing him to reach into the Realm of Souls, retrieving the spirits of dead soldiers for binding and eternal service to his will.

A colossal orb of purple-edged darkness materialises - those who do not escape its crystalline touch are doomed for eternity!
Creatures of the dark beware, for the Mage casts a ball of pure light to banish enemies of White Wizardry.
The Wizard calls forth spectral winds that howl through the enemy ranks, tearing their souls from their bodies.
A whirlwind of skulls tears across the battlefield, devouring all in its path in the Goddess of the Green Moon's bitter, vindictive name.
Few have the strength to break free once the Kraken has them within its horrid, betentacled grasp.
The Wizard spits out an ancient curse, causing their enemies to age at an incredible rate - their hair turning white and skin shrivelling up.
Bolts of Dark Magic leap from the caster’s eyes, withering flesh and blackening the bone beneath.

The caster intones the dread syllables once uttered by Nagash, restoring friendly targets.

Necromancers can awaken mortal remains to reinforce their Undead legions.

Friendly targets are filled with magical energy, making them even more aggressive!

The cries from Krell's victims reinvigorate his deathly corpse in a perpetual cycle of suffering and pain.
Such is the aura of entropy that surrounds the armour that it has the power to decay the magic of enemy weapons in an instant.
Vlad motivates his devoted followers with his majestic presence; the Lord of Undeath is without peer.
Vlad motivates his devoted followers with his majestic presence; the Lord of Undeath is without peer.
An Unholy swarm obliterates all in its path.
Neferrata calls forth her handmaidens to swarm and envelop the target in a whirlwind of beauty and death.

As the first Vampire, Neferata does not need to feast on the blood to revel in its pleasures, but she still does so willingly, gracefully ripping apart her victims and dancing in the red clouds that spill forth.
This ancient staff imbues any sorceries Neferata wields with pain and torment, causing waves of crippling agony to pulse outwards.

This blade has seen the blood of countless victims who have been sacrificed on its edge, their screams echoing out whenever the blade is drawn. So much pain and anguish has twisted the obsidian dagger to a point that it has developed Vampiric powers of its own.
Summons bats from every corner of the World, they will block the Sun and poop EVERYWHERE!
Unearths Endless Tomb, Tomb that contains seamlessly unlimited number of skeletons.
